creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, xerographic text and illustration of a pig drinking and smoking before a miniature New York skyline, inside of a run-down apartment, on flourescent pink covers. In the upper right corner, the $4 price has been crossed out and now reads 3!; 20 pp.
title: East Village Sampler
